synopsis.text: Bronze, Silver, and Gold, the three guardians of a darkened future, stand between the world and utter chaos. Among them is Lemnear, the silver-haired guardian of Silver, who is fueled by vengeance for the death of her parents and the destruction of her village at the hands of an evil mage, Gardein. As she pursues her sworn enemy, Lemnear uncovers a hidden power within herself, one that could save the ancient world from the clutches of evil. But the Dark Lord, the mastermind behind Gardein, has his sights set on Lemnear's newfound power, turning her quest for revenge into a desperate struggle for the fate of the world. With her fellow guardian Bronze kidnapped and her own freedom at risk, Lemnear must rise above her personal vendetta and embrace her destiny as the world's last hope.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
